InfluenceRule.name: If %i% is cold, %i% will be more a little likely to want to be enemies with %r%.
If %i% is irritable, %i% will be more a little likely to want to be enemies with %r%.
If %i% is mean, %i% will be more a little likely to want to be enemies with %r%.
If %i% is a hothead, %i% will be more a little likely to want to be enemies with %r%.
If %i% is vengeful, %i% will be more a little likely to want to be enemies with %r%.
If %i% is shy, %i% will be a little less likely to want to be enemies with %r%.
If %i% is kind, %i% will be a little less likely to want to be enemies with %r%.
If %i% is loyal and %i% and %r% are friends, %i% will be a little less likely to want to be enemies with %r%.
If %i% is forgiving, %i% will be less likely to want to be enemies with %r%.
If %i% is angry at %r%, %i% will be more likely to want to be enemies.
If %i% has a crush on %r%, %i% will be less likely to want to be enemies.
If %i% is dating %r%, %i% will be less likely to want to be enemies with %r%.
If %i% was cheated on by %r%, %i% will be more likely to want to be enemies with %r%.
If %r% has done something mean to %i% recently, %i% will be more likely to want to declare war.
If %r% has done something negative to %i% recently, and done things more than once, %i% will be more likely to want to declare war.
If %i% feels grateful toward %r% for something good they did recently, %i% will be less likely to want to be enemies.
you want to declare war on people mean to your friends
If %r% is kind, %r% is less likely to accept being enemies.
If %r% is loyal, %r% is less likely to accept being enemies.
If %r% is forgiving, %r% is less likely to accept being enemies.
If %r% is irritable, %r% is more likely to accept being enemies.
If %r% is mean, %r% is more likely to accept being enemies.
If %r% is a hothead, %r% is more likely to accept being enemies.
If %r% is angry at %i%,, %r% is more likely to accept being enemies.
If %i% has done something generally negative to %r% recently, %r% will be more likely to want to be enemies.
If %i% has done something mean to %r% recently, and done things multiple times, %r% will be more likely to want to be enemies.
If %i% has done a bunch of nice things to %r% recently, %r% will be less likely to want to be enemies.
If %r% is dating %i%, %r% will be more reluctant to want to be enemies with %r%.

Effect.PerformanceRealization: %i% declared war on %r% by reminding everyone of %pron(r,his/her)% lameness
%i% posted that lame video of %r% on the interwebs and %rs% became internet famous
%i% tried to punch %r% but %pron(r,he/she)% pulled out some nina move or something
%i% declared war on %r% via a stand-off
%i% declared war against %r% for that mean thing %pron(r,he/she)% did
%i% tried to declare war on %r% or something for some thing %r% had totally forgotten about anyway
%i% declared war on %r% for macking on %pron(i,his/her)% sweetie
%i% got so sick of %r% %pron(i,he/she)% tried to issue like an ultimatum
%i% confronted %r% about dating %o%, but %rs% realized who %prons(r,he/she)% really wanted to be with
%i% started a war with %r% over getting %op% attention
%o% prevented a war between %pron(o,his/her)% %gender(i,boyfriend,girlfriend)% %i% and %pron(o,his/her)% friend %r%

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I should thank you. Remember when %toc1%?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Yeah, what's it to you?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I put it up on my blog, and it's been getting a lot of hits.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: You *what*!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Consider this war. And I have only just begun.
I should thank you. Remember when %toc1%?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Yeah, what's it to you?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I put it up on my blog, and it's been getting a lot of hits.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Awesome! I've always wanted to be an internet star. Thanks.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey %r%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: What do you want?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Consider this my declaration of war!
Hey %r%.
Dodge this!

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Barely dodged that one. Did you hear about %random(the boxing match I'm practicing for,my aspirations to become a ninja,my unbeatable reaction time)%?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Ummmmm.... yeah?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Well, thanks for keeping me on my toes. See you around.

Instantiation.name: DeclareWar - Low Bud (i,r) Low Bud (r,i) Accept

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: We meet again.
Kinda getting tired of it.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: As am I.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I guess you know what that means...

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Afraid I do.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: This means War.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: This. Means. War.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Why'd you do it, %r%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Do what, %i%? What is it this time?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Oh you know quite well, don't play dumb.%toc1%!
I haven't forgotten.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh... That.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Yes, yes... That. I've been waiting.
And I've decided.
That this means war.
%r%! I hope you didn't think I'd forget so easily...

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I guess I did. What's your problem?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: My *problem*!? My problem is that time when %toc1%!
I won't stand for this injustice any longer!
Don't '%i%' me! This means War, %gender(r,mister,missy)%!

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %i%, look. This isn't some ridiculous game with no meaning to the rest of your life. This is high school.
Don't get in over your head. 'War', hah! What a lamebrained notion.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Why, you...
You %pejorative%. I heard about you and %o%! How could you!
I won't stand for this! Until you end things with %gender(o,him,her)%, it's war between you and I.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: An ultimatum!? Are you kidding me!? What are you, in elementary school??
Fine. You want war? You got it. Bring the calvalry.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %r%! I'm so sick of running into you!

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Umm... Sorry? It's not my fault we go to the same school...

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Didn't I tell you last time, I better not see your face again... OR ELSE?
Are you sure? I coulda sworn...

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Nope. Pretty sure you didn't. Look - I'm late for class, %i%. Chill out and let's talk about this later.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Huh... I coulda sworn...

Instantiation.name: DeclareWar - Dating (i, r) Dating (r, o) Reject

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I heard about what you did, %r%.
I know I'm not the only one you're seeing.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %i%... I can explain!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Doesn't matter. You have a choice. It's either *me* or... *War*.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I'm so sorry %i%. I don't know what I was thinking...
I got confused! You've always been the one I want. You're everything to me!
I'll get rid of %o%! I promise!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: You've made the right decision.
Hey %r%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: What do you want %i%?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I can't handle you hanging out with my %gender(o,boyfriend,girlfriend)%.
If you really want to play this game, then it's on. I'm going to take it to a whole new level.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: You think a couple of threats are going to stop me from hanging out with my friend?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: If that isn't enough then I guess I'll have to go even farther.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Bring it on %pejorative%. %o% is going to be all mine.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %greeting% %r%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: What do you want %i%?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I'm sick of you hanging out with %o%. If you keep this up I'm going to have to take drastic actions.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: What are you talking about?

LineOfDialogue.otherLine: Hey guys, what are you up to?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Your %gender(i,boyfriend,girlfriend)% is acting crazy. It's like %pron(i,he/she)% is trying to start WW3 or something.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I just can't handle it when you hang out with %pron(r,him/her)% all the time.

LineOfDialogue.otherLine: Look, %r% is just my friend, you are my %gender(i,boyfriend,girlfriend)%. You two are going to have to deal with that.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Whatever happens I'm not being friends with %pron(r,him/her)%.
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Me neither.

LineOfDialogue.otherLine: Chill the freak out. Both of you.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Consider this war postponed... for now.
%r%, I have something to say to you.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: This ought to be good.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: You have done nothing but make my life miserable. You spurned my friendship, you destroyed our romance... and look at you, all smug like you're going to get away with it.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: This is boring. Can I go?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: You are *not* getting away with it, %gender(r,sir,madam)%. I will personally make it my mission in life to make sure yours is a living hell.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: You're on, %pejorative%.
